StmtSimple.StatementText: SELECT i.InvoiceID AS [ID продажи] ,c.CustomerName AS [Название клиента] ,i.InvoiceDate AS [Дата продажи] ,(l.UnitPrice * l.Quantity) AS [Сумма продажи] ,SUM(l.UnitPrice * l.Quantity) OVER (ORDER BY dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, i.InvoiceDate), 0)) AS [Сумма продаж за месяц, накопительно] FROM Sales.Invoices AS i JOIN Sales.InvoiceLines AS l ON i.InvoiceID = l.InvoiceID JOIN Sales.Customers AS c ON i.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE i.InvoiceDate >= convert(date, '2015-01-01', 120) ORDER BY [Дата продажи], [Название клиента]

ScalarOperator.ScalarString: CASE WHEN [Expr1019]=(0) THEN NULL ELSE [Expr1020] END
CASE WHEN [Expr1015]>(1) THEN (0) ELSE NULL END
